content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI remembered running the command "list_files" in the current directory, which returned a list of files. I have received a command to execute shell with the argument "sudo apt-get update". I executed the command "sudo apt-get upgrade" using the execute_shell command, which returned a successful update of the package lists. I then executed the command "sudo apt-get dist-upgrade" using the execute_shell command, which also returned a successful upgrade with no changes.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo apt-get dist-upgrade"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'Reading package lists...\\nBuilding dependency tree...\\nReading state information...\\nCalculating upgrade...\\n0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 0 not upgraded.\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "", "args": {}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command  returned: Unknown command ''. Please refer to the 'COMMANDS' list for available commands and only respond in the specified JSON format."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "assigned_tasks.txt"}}}'}]
